welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wulfrath, Germany! This charming city is known for its beautiful landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Wulfrath has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, primarily serving low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: A newly built terminal at Düsseldorf International Airport, dedicated to serving international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cologne/bonn Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Cologne/bonn Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost carriers and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport with no time limit.
